name: Golf-N-Stuff
description:
UNFINISHED PROTOTYPE

+ Press " ` " (Back quote) to lock cursor. 

+ Press "LShift" to enter and exit putting. 

+ Press "R" to reset position.

One day while on the toilet I was nostalgic about how in my childhood I would go to minigolf courses sometimes. Because of that for a short time I got really obsessed with minigolf. So I remade the mechanics from the popular minigolf game "Golf It!".
